description.value:
Trigger A creature falls into the water

Effect The smashed constructs at the bottom of the water try to Grapple the triggering creature (Athletics [[/r 1d20+12 #Athletics]]{+12}). The trap rolls initiative.

stealth.details: (trained); @Check[type:perception|dc:23|traits:action:seek] (expert) to notice the construct limbs at the bottom of the pit.

details.description: The limbs of smashed constructs line the bottom of the fissure, beneath the water. They desperately grab anything that gets too close.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:21|name:Immobilize Limbs] (trained) or @Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:19|name:Immobilize Limbs]{Engineering Lore} or @Check[type:azlant-lore|dc:19|name:Immobilize Limbs]{Azlant Lore} twice to immobilize the limbs, or @Check[type:deception|dc:18|name:Trick Limbs]{ Deception} twice to trick the limbs into grasping each other.
details.routine: (2 actions) The grasping limbs try to Grapple all creatures in the water (Athletics [[/r 1d20 +12 #Athletics]]{+12}). They then tighten around all creatures they have grabbed or restrained, dealing [[/r 2d8[bludgeoning]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|basic:true|name:Grasping Limbs]).
